title: The Midlands Ripper - Part 1/2: Episode 280
description:
When two sex workers were murdered and dumped within five miles of each other, detectives desperately tried to find the killer or killers. Were both women murdered by the same man - and were the local whispers true that a serial killer was on the loose? 

In this episode of the UK True Crime weekly podcast, I look at just what happened and also what happened next.....

1,  Please buy my book 'Gone Fishing' about the life and crimes of Angus Sinclair.
